title: Champ Select Timer freezes at 0
body:
Ive searched up tons of people with this same problem and  riot ignores all their posts. So if any players have had this problem and can help I would greatly appreciate it!

https://imgur.com/a/pishp

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the issues you're having here.  This can happen if your connection is specifically having problems with our services, in this case losing sync with champion select.  If you're on wifi, going wired will likely fix this up.  Otherwise, see if [power cycling ](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic)your router or [configuring your DNS ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)might help.  Test it in a custom game, though.
